displayname.description: The display name of a host in your LogicMonitor account or the desired display name of a device to add into monitoring.

target.description: The LogicMonitor object you wish to manage.

company.description: The LogicMonitor account company name. If you would log in to your account at "superheroes.logicmonitor.com" you would use "superheroes".

hostname.description: The hostname of a host in your LogicMonitor account, or the desired hostname of a device to add into monitoring. Required for managing hosts (target=host).

user.description: A LogicMonitor user name. The module will authenticate and perform actions on behalf of this user.

fullpath.description: The fullpath of the hostgroup object you would like to manage. Recommend running on a single ansible host. Required for management of LogicMonitor host groups (target=hostgroup).

password.description: The password for the chosen LogicMonitor User. If an md5 hash is used, the digest flag must be set to true.

collector.description: The fully qualified domain name of a collector in your LogicMonitor account. This is optional for querying a LogicMonitor host when a displayname is specified. This is required for querying a LogicMonitor host when a displayname is not specified.
